Title: XSS In CMSSecurity BackURL
Description: In follow up to SS-2016-001 there is yet a minor unresolved fix to incorrectly encoded URL.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.1.21, all versions starting from 3.2.0-alpha0 before 3.2.6, all versions starting from 3.3.0-alpha0 before 3.3.4, all versions starting from 3.4.0-alpha0 before 3.4.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.1.21 before 3.2.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.2.6 before 3.3.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.3.4 before 3.4.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.4.2
